name: Pong - But You Can Shoot
description:
Hello,

You just found a really simple game, what i was creating because of the idea: What if in pong you could shoot? Would it be easier? Would it be harder? Try for yourself!

Includes:

  • Single Player
  • Powerups
  • Double ball
  • Pong
  • Bullets
  • Neon colors and techno music

...and totally not importantly IT'S FREE (at least it's pay what you want, but you can always pay zero)

Controls:

  • Up - Down arrows -> movement
  • S -> Shoot
  • Space -> Starts or restarts the game
